rationale: Note states "200 mg at bedtime for three nights then stop" which matches taper instructions closely.
Contingency to call if paresthesia returns or hold at 100 mg was not mentioned.
Lisinopril, atorvastatin 40 mg with supper (discard 20 mg), and aspirin 81 mg instructions absent.
No mention of spacing turmeric-ginger capsules 4 h away from aspirin.
CBC ordered before next week, explicitly notes no fasting required.
No plan documented to send a fresh blister pack of atorvastatin 40 mg.
Patient’s pill-sorting confusion and adherence issues not reflected.
Instruction to log bedtime, wake-up, and groggy spells captured verbatim.
Aside from referencing the existing 300 mg gabapentin, no conflicting med list or unrelated chart data copied; minor concern only.
Captures roughly 3 of 11 key details; overall completeness limited.
Multiple important omissions (maintenance meds, contingency plan, adherence issues); no fabrications.
